full_summary:
### Title
#### ENG: BPM021259 EMC Hardware and Software Maintenance and Support for Public Health Agency of Canada
#### FRA: BPM021259 Maintenance et soutien du matériel et du logiciel EMC pour l’Agence de la santé publique du Canada

### Tender Details
#### Reference Number: SSC-24-00026232:T
#### Amendment Number: 0
#### Solicitation Number: BPM021259/26232
#### Publication Date: April 4, 2024
#### Tender Closing Date: April 23, 2024, 2:00 p.m. EST

### Description
Public Health Agency of Canada requires EMC hardware and software maintenance and support services. The successful contractor will be responsible for ensuring the continuity of EMC services for the Public Health Agency of Canada.

### Trade Agreements
The contract shall comply with Canada–Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada–Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada–Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada–Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada–Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and Canada–Peru Free Trade Agreement.

### End User Entities
The end-user of the contract is the Public Health Agency of Canada, and Shared Services Canada (SSC) is the contracting entity responsible for the procurement process.

### Contact Information
#### Name: Eric Lavigne
#### Email: [tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
#### Phone: (343) 541-8756
#### Fax: (613) 960-6026

### Additional Information
Bid submission inquiries can be directed to the above listed contact email. Suppliers may also inquire or submit emails for further information. 

### Sollicitation Files
Access to the solicitation can be found on the P2P portal through the following link: <https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_publicUnder Solicitation List: BPM021259> SSC BPM021259 EMC Hardware and Software Maintenance and Support for Public Health Agency of Canada Amendment 000.
